movie.title: The Clearing
movie.plot: When affluent executive Wayne Hayes is kidnapped by a disgruntled employee and held for ransom in a forest, Wayneâ€™s wife is forced to reckon with the FBI agents as they negotiate with the kidnapper.

studios.title: Mediastream Dritte Film GmbH & Co. Beteiligungs KG

events.title: Gerrit Jan Heijn, who Wayne Hayes is based on, is kidnapped
Arnold Mack, who Ferdi Elsas is based on, is arrested
